pageContext.title: List of tech and startup events in Singapore
pageContext.content:
If you’re looking to mingle or gain new knowledge, look no further. We’ve curated for you a list of events in the tech and startup community, sorted by date. All pricing in Singapore dollars unless otherwise stated. Add your event here.

Featured events

AngelCentral Deep Dive Series: Investing in Early-Stage Hardware Startups

Hardware startups, particularly in Deep Technology, is difficult to evaluate for angel investors as there are many facets and considerations such as technology development, costing and production, certification and regulations. This workshop provides angel investors with the framework and evaluation methodology to evaluate and invest in early-stage hardware startups.

Date and time: January 19, 9:00am – 12:00pm
Location: BASH, 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Level 3, 139955
Price/pax: $0 (for members only) – $338 (early bird)
RSVP here

#mtpcon Singapore 2019

Mind the Product (#mtpcon) is THE product management conference, bringing together product leaders from around the world to explore the intersection of design, technology, and business – inspiring you to build better products. #mtpcon is for passionate product managers of all levels of experience and after running the world’s largest product management conferences in London and San Francisco we’re thrilled to be bringing our unique event, full of inspiration and learning, to Asia Pacific, with our first conference in Singapore!

Date and time: March 26, 9:00am – 6:00pm
Location: Victoria Theatre, 9 Empress Place, Singapore, 179556, Singapore
Price/pax: 1032
RSVP here

More events

Indoor Ag-Con Asia

Indoor Ag-Con Asia is a tech-focused event that brings together growers, entrepreneurs, investors, tech geeks, academics and policymakers to discuss the technology of farming in warehouses, greenhouses and container farms. Our events cover tech from robotics and AI to grow systems and LED lighting, and find and fund the best indoor ag tech via our Indoor Ag-Ignite pitch competition.

Date and time: January 15-16, 2019
Location: Marina Bay Sands, 10 Bayfront Avenue, Singapore 018956
Price/pax: From S$500
RSVP here

WomenChangemakers #6

Watch 3 C-level women executives talk candidly about the biggest personal changes they went through, and the impact it made on their lives. Our 6th WomenChangemakers features Esther An from CDL, Sonia Gupta from Accenture, and Peta Latimer from Mercer. PLUS, there’s a disco after party!

Date and time: January 18, 6:30pm-9:30pm
Location:
Price/pax: $25
RSVP here

Linde & Siemens Connected Safety Challenge

Join Linde and Siemens first-ever joint hackathon Connected Safety Challenge to advance workplace technology to make employees’ lives safer!

Date and time: January 18, 6:00pm — Jan 20, 6:30pm
Location: the Hive @ 36 Carpenter Street, Singapore 059915
Price/pax: Free
RSVP here

EmTech Asia 2019

The Conference on the Emerging Technologies That Matter

Date and time: January 22-23, 2019
Location: Marina Bay Sands Expo and Convention Centre, Singapore
Price/pax:
RSVP here

AngelCentral Master Class Series: Angel Investing Workshop

This workshop aims to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to become a competent Angel Investor. It covers ecosystem brief, portfolio construction, dealflow, evaluation methods and investment process. The trainers are full-time angels with over $5M invested in the startup space.

Date and time: January 26, 9:00am – 1:00pm
Location: BASH, 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Level 3, 139955
Price/pax: $0 (for members) – $388 (early bird)
RSVP here

Applying IP Fundamentals in Business (Blended Learning)

Accelerate towards success with a better understanding of intellectual property law and how it can be applied to support and drive businesses in achieving their business strategies and objectives.

Date and time: February 7 (Commencement of Online Modules), February 28 and March 7 (Classroom Sessions)
Location: 51 Bras Basah Road, #01-01, Manulife Centre
Price/pax: 1 Module: S$385.20 (SICC Members – S$324.42)
2 Modules: $770.40 (SICC Members – S$654.84)
3 Modules: $1,155.60 (SICC Members – S$924.48)
4 Modules: $1,540.80 (SICC Members – S$1,232.64)
RSVP here

4th Asia Conference on Big Data and Analytics for Insurance

With the rise of InsurTech, it is an exciting time for Insurers as they embark on an unprecedented journey. This event will also serve as a perfect opportunity for industry players to leverage new solutions to bridge the customer engagement gap.

Date and time: February 18-19, 9:00am – 5:00pm
Location: Mandarin Orchard Hotel, Singapore
Price/pax: Early Bird at USD$ 1580 and Usual Rate at USD $ 1980
RSVP here

TechHR 2019 Singapore

TechHR is not merely an event. It’s a movement of sorts. It brings together the best of businesses, HR Leaders, HR Product & Service experts and HR Technology partners & start–ups from around the globe.

Date and time: February 28, 8:00am – 6:00pm
Location: Marina Bay Sands, Singapore
Price/pax: S$1165
RSVP here

FIT Summit

FIT Summit is the crossroads of fitness, business and technology – where brands, companies, clubs and investors meet to discuss market trends, business challenges and new opportunities.

Date and time: March 20, 2019 9:00am-6:00pm
Location: 1A Cuscaden Rd, Singapore 249716
Price/pax: SG$695
RSVP here

#mtpcon Singapore 2019 Workshops

For the first time ever we’re offering a day of hands-on product management training workshops in Singapore, enabling you to deep-dive into some new skills. Led by true experts in the field, topics include Rapid Experimentation, User Research, Foundations 101, Essentials 102, Leadership, and Roadmapping.

These workshops are the day before #mtpcon Singapore, our dedicated product management conference, which is happening on Tuesday, 26th March 2019.

Date and time: March 25, 9:30am – 5:00pm
Location: Huone Clarke Quay, 3D River Valley Road, #03-01 Clarke Quay, 179023, Singapore
Price/pax: 962 – 1237 (depending on which workshop is chosen)
RSVP here

Oracle OpenWorld Asia

We’re pleased to host Oracle OpenWorld Asia 2019 in Singapore.

Join us and experience the best of the Oracle OpenWorld conference—insight, expertise, and community.

Date and time: March 26-27
Location: Marina Bay Sands
Price/pax: Complimentary for trade & industry professionals
RSVP here

Rotorcraft Asia 2019

The Best of Rotorcraft. In One Great Lift Off.

Date and time: April 9-11
Location: Changi Exhibition Centre, 9 Aviation Park Road, Singapore 498760
Price/pax:
RSVP here

Unmanned Systems Asia 2019

The Future is Unmanned

Date and time: April 9-11
Location: Changi Exhibition Centre, 9 Aviation Park Road, Singapore 498760
Price/pax:
RSVP here

FiNext Awards & Conference

FiNext Awards & Conference provides a platform for the global FinTech sector, allowing start-ups, SMEs, incumbent tech providers, investors, financial institutions and other stakeholders to connect and interact under one roof. In addition to the conference, FiNext Tech Awards acknowledge the efforts of FinTech thought leaders, torchbearers of the industry.

Date and time: April 25, 8:00am
Location: Pan Pacific Singapore, 7 Raffles Blvd, Marina Square, Singapore 039595
Price/pax: US$799
RSVP here

Seamless Asia 2019

Seamless Asia is about the future of commerce in Asia. Bringing together 6,000+ attendees, we explore the big ideas, market disruptors, top industry trends and technologies that are changing the way we do business. With our biggest ever agenda, featuring 10 tracks of content and more banks, retailers, e-tailers, start-up innovators, fintechs and partners than ever before, join us as we chart the future of commerce in Asia.

Date and time: June 26-27, 2019
Location: Suntec City Convention Centre, Singapore
Price/pax: For all 10 Conference Tracks and Exhibition Pass- Free
For the Seamless Summit,
2-Day – S$ 1695
3-Day – S$ 1995
1-Day Workshop – S$ 695
RSVP here

Innovfest Unbound 2019

Innovfest Unbound is Southeast Asia’s largest, most exciting and award-winning innovation festival, with an expected attendance in 2019 of over 15,000 delegates from across the world.

Date and time: June 27, 8:30am to June 28, 6:00pm
Location: Marina Bay Sands Expo and Convention Centre, 10 Bayfront Ave, Singapore 018971
Price/pax: S$950
RSVP here

How to add your event

Fill out the form below to get started. To avoid disappointment, share events at least two weeks in advance. We’ll vet the event and update the list ASAP. We don’t accept:

  • Paid classes by education providers (for example, coding classes for kids)
  • Webinars
  • Events not held in Singapore

seo.title: Complete list of tech and startup events in Singapore
seo.description: Mingling or gaining knowledge? We’ve curated for you the most comprehensive list of events in the tech and startup community, sorted by topic and date.
